title: Build failed for master on Ubuntu 16.04
body_html:
I'm not sure if this is my fault, or something that might be of interest to others, but I tried to build the current master today, but without luck.

I checked-out to 0.4.1 and the build finished successfully.

build log

The error:

[734/853] Linking CXX executable bin/scalar_test
FAILED: bin/scalar_test 
: && /home/elan/ccache/lib/c++  -msse3 -msse4.1 -msse4.2   --std=c++11  -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -rdynamic -DONNX_NAMESPACE=onnx_torch -fopenmp -O2 -fPIC -Wno-narrowing -Wall -Wextra -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Wno-type-limits -Wno-array-bounds -Wno-unknown-pragmas -Wno-sign-compare -Wno-unused-parameter -Wno-unused-variable -Wno-unused-function -Wno-unused-result -Wno-strict-overflow -Wno-strict-aliasing -Wno-error=deprecated-declarations -Wno-stringop-overflow -DHAVE_AVX_CPU_DEFINITION -DHAVE_AVX2_CPU_DEFINITION -O3  -L"/home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/pytorch-devel/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib"  -Wl,-rpath,$ORIGIN caffe2/CMakeFiles/scalar_test.dir/__/aten/src/ATen/test/scalar_test.cpp.o  -o bin/scalar_test -L/home/elan/anaconda3/lib -Wl,-rpath,/home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/pytorch-devel/pytorch/build/lib:/home/elan/anaconda3/lib:/usr/local/cuda/lib64:::::::::::::::: -Wl,--no-as-needed,/home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/pytorch-devel/pytorch/build/lib/libcaffe2.so -Wl,--as-needed -Wl,--no-as-needed,/home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/pytorch-devel/pytorch/build/lib/libcaffe2_gpu.so -Wl,--as-needed /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -pthread -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so lib/libcaffe2.so lib/libprotobuf.a -lpthread -lmkl_intel_lp64 -lmkl_gnu_thread -lmkl_core -fopenmp -lpthread -lm /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcufft.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcurand.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so.7 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcublas.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcublas_device.a && :
/home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/pytorch-devel/pytorch/build/lib/libcaffe2_gpu.so: undefined reference to `at::Error::Error(at::SourceLocation, std::string)'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

env

PyTorch version: 0.5.0a0+9e7303f
Is debug build: No
CUDA used to build PyTorch: 9.2.148

OS: Ubuntu 16.04.5 LTS
GCC version: (Ubuntu 5.4.0-6ubuntu1~16.04.10) 5.4.0 20160609
CMake version: version 3.12.0

Python version: 3.6
Is CUDA available: Yes
CUDA runtime version: 9.2.148
GPU models and configuration: GPU 0: GeForce GTX 980
Nvidia driver version: 396.45
cuDNN version: Probably one of the following:
/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64/libcudnn.so.7.0.3
/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64/libcudnn_static.a
/usr/local/cuda-9.2/lib64/libcudnn.so
/usr/local/cuda-9.2/lib64/libcudnn.so.7
/usr/local/cuda-9.2/lib64/libcudnn.so.7.1.4
/usr/local/cuda-9.2/lib64/libcudnn_static.a

Versions of relevant libraries:
[pip] msgpack-numpy (0.4.3)
[pip] numpy (1.15.0)
[pip] numpydoc (0.8.0)
[pip] pytorch-ignite (0.1.0, /home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/ignite)
[pip] torch (0.5.0a0+9e7303f, /home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/pytorch-devel/pytorch)
[pip] torchnet (0.0.1)
[pip] torchtext (0.3.0, /home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/text)
[pip] torchvision (0.2.0)
[conda] magma-cuda90              2.3.0                         1    pytorch
[conda] pytorch-ignite            0.1.0                     <pip>
[conda] torch                     0.5.0a0+9e7303f           <pip>
[conda] torchtext                 0.3.0                     <pip

sorry for the trouble,
Marcin
body_text:
I'm not sure if this is my fault, or something that might be of interest to others, but I tried to build the current master today, but without luck.
I checked-out to 0.4.1 and the build finished successfully.
build log
The error:
[734/853] Linking CXX executable bin/scalar_test
FAILED: bin/scalar_test 
: && /home/elan/ccache/lib/c++  -msse3 -msse4.1 -msse4.2   --std=c++11  -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -rdynamic -DONNX_NAMESPACE=onnx_torch -fopenmp -O2 -fPIC -Wno-narrowing -Wall -Wextra -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Wno-type-limits -Wno-array-bounds -Wno-unknown-pragmas -Wno-sign-compare -Wno-unused-parameter -Wno-unused-variable -Wno-unused-function -Wno-unused-result -Wno-strict-overflow -Wno-strict-aliasing -Wno-error=deprecated-declarations -Wno-stringop-overflow -DHAVE_AVX_CPU_DEFINITION -DHAVE_AVX2_CPU_DEFINITION -O3  -L"/home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/pytorch-devel/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib"  -Wl,-rpath,$ORIGIN caffe2/CMakeFiles/scalar_test.dir/__/aten/src/ATen/test/scalar_test.cpp.o  -o bin/scalar_test -L/home/elan/anaconda3/lib -Wl,-rpath,/home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/pytorch-devel/pytorch/build/lib:/home/elan/anaconda3/lib:/usr/local/cuda/lib64:::::::::::::::: -Wl,--no-as-needed,/home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/pytorch-devel/pytorch/build/lib/libcaffe2.so -Wl,--as-needed -Wl,--no-as-needed,/home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/pytorch-devel/pytorch/build/lib/libcaffe2_gpu.so -Wl,--as-needed /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -pthread -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so lib/libcaffe2.so lib/libprotobuf.a -lpthread -lmkl_intel_lp64 -lmkl_gnu_thread -lmkl_core -fopenmp -lpthread -lm /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcufft.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcurand.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so.7 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcublas.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcublas_device.a && :

body:
I'm not sure if this is my fault, or something that might be of interest to others, but I tried to build the current master today, but without luck.

I checked-out to `0.4.1` and the build finished successfully. 

[build log](https://gist.github.com/elanmart/b67fdfe51159090eac0278ef8f5dd01d)

The error:
```
[734/853] Linking CXX executable bin/scalar_test
FAILED: bin/scalar_test 
: && /home/elan/ccache/lib/c++  -msse3 -msse4.1 -msse4.2   --std=c++11  -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -rdynamic -DONNX_NAMESPACE=onnx_torch -fopenmp -O2 -fPIC -Wno-narrowing -Wall -Wextra -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Wno-type-limits -Wno-array-bounds -Wno-unknown-pragmas -Wno-sign-compare -Wno-unused-parameter -Wno-unused-variable -Wno-unused-function -Wno-unused-result -Wno-strict-overflow -Wno-strict-aliasing -Wno-error=deprecated-declarations -Wno-stringop-overflow -DHAVE_AVX_CPU_DEFINITION -DHAVE_AVX2_CPU_DEFINITION -O3  -L"/home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/pytorch-devel/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib"  -Wl,-rpath,$ORIGIN caffe2/CMakeFiles/scalar_test.dir/__/aten/src/ATen/test/scalar_test.cpp.o  -o bin/scalar_test -L/home/elan/anaconda3/lib -Wl,-rpath,/home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/pytorch-devel/pytorch/build/lib:/home/elan/anaconda3/lib:/usr/local/cuda/lib64:::::::::::::::: -Wl,--no-as-needed,/home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/pytorch-devel/pytorch/build/lib/libcaffe2.so -Wl,--as-needed -Wl,--no-as-needed,/home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/pytorch-devel/pytorch/build/lib/libcaffe2_gpu.so -Wl,--as-needed /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -pthread -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so lib/libcaffe2.so lib/libprotobuf.a -lpthread -lmkl_intel_lp64 -lmkl_gnu_thread -lmkl_core -fopenmp -lpthread -lm /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcufft.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcurand.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so.7 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcublas.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcublas_device.a && :
/home/elan/Mine/ml-mine/code/pytorch-devel/pytorch/build/lib/libcaffe2_gpu.so: undefined reference to `at::Error::Error(at::SourceLocation, std::string)'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
```

```

Is debug build: No

OS: Ubuntu 16.04.5 LTS
```

sorry for the trouble,
Marcin
